strapiArticle.title: Figuring out how to use a strapi blog
strapiArticle.content:
I've just started a new strapi and gatsby static blog. 
I'm not too sure how to write content for this, how markdown works, or lazy loading, or really how I put this blog together. I followed this link: https://strapi.io/blog/build-a-static-blog-with-gatsby-and-strapi 
and from there I put everything together.

I will slowly understand what's happening a bit better and hopefully I'll be able to figure out how to directly upload from my built static markup/code into my github pages repository.

Stay tuned,
Weber
